title: Missing Tokens?
body:
I've been playing the event since it started and I am finding people saying that you would have **280** by the end of the event but I am missing **50**.
Did I miss any or did I just blank out on a few days?

replies.body: We looked at your account and it seems like you should have received 230 tokens from all the missions you've completed so far. That is 50 short of 280, but the event hasn't ended yet! You still got a couple of days left to complete some more missions and get more tokens. Keep being a boss agent of Chaos and you'll get them soon. :)
